"Custom Support Partner Equipment":
"About Support Partner Equipment

You can equip your Support Partner with items and eggs stored in your inventory.
※Support Partners cannot be equipped with Skill Rings.
※If an item has an Attachment Gauge, it will not fill while equipped to a Support Partner.

Depending on the category of weapon given to your Support Partner, their class may change to a different class.
